casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

91-1259. Forbes v. Midwest Air Charter, Inc.

Cuyahoga App. No. 56815. (Appeal of Ina Forbes and cross-appeal of Piper Aircraft Corp.) Discretionary appeal and cross-appeal allowed.

Lundberg Stratton, J., would allow the cross-appeal only. Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., would deny the appeal and cross-appeal.
